name: Supremely Talented Player
author: REDICE Studio
content: Six years ago, humanity was almost brought to an end when mysterious towers filled the skies across the globe, unleashing deadly monsters. Fortunately, the people known as Players emerged, blessed with supernatural powers that they harnessed to save mankind. Among them is Yuseong Kang, a phenomenal player who has saved the world time after time. Once again, he has successfully averted global catastrophe… and in an internationally broadcasted interview praising his heroic endeavors, he says, “I’m
